analyzed: ▁dukkhaṃ ▁dukkhasamuday o ▁dukkh anirodh o ▁dukkh anirodh agām inī ▁paṭipadā ti
▁dukkhaṃ ▁dukkhasamuday o ▁dukkh anirodh o ▁dukkh anirodh agām inī ▁paṭipadā

original: Ariyamaggo anicco, so ca na dukkhoti?
Dukkhasamudayo anicco, so ca na dukkhoti?
Hañci sā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, tena vata re vattabbe—
